snippet: Former New England Patriots player Aaron Hernandez will stand trial early next year in the 2012 fatal shootings of two men outside a Boston nightclub, a crime prosecutors say was prompted by Hernandez's rage over a spilled drink....
lead_paragraph: Former New England Patriots player Aaron Hernandez will stand trial early next year in the 2012 fatal shootings of two men outside a Boston nightclub, a crime prosecutors say was prompted by Hernandez's rage over a spilled drink.

headline.main: Trial Date Set for Ex-Patriots Star Hernandez in 2 Slayings
headline.print_headline: Trial Date Set for Ex-Patriots Star Hernandez in 2 Slayings
